Strings.Text: It's electronically locked.{pause}{clear}To unlock, you need the 3rd \nEnergy Facility Key Card.{pause}
It's electronically locked.{pause}{clear}To unlock, you need the 3rd \nEnergy Facility Key Card.{pause}
There is a tool box with repair \ntools inside.{pause}{clear}But there isn't a tool that's of \nany use.{pause}
There is a small boiler.{pause}{clear}It must have been built after \ntheir arrival to this world.{pause}
Must have been attacked by the \ndinosaurs while getting supplies.{pause}

Must have died in the past few 
days.{pause}{clear}His mid-section looks like it has 
been blown away.{pause}{clear}It appears that the winged beasts 
had found him.{pause}
There's an ID card inside his \nshirt pocket.{pause}
There's a dead body. In his hand \nis a gun. The bullets have all {pause}{clear}been used up. There are many \nwounds which appear to have {pause}{clear}been pecked by beaks.{pause}
There's something underneath. \nYou've found a new DINO FILE.{pause}
